moves.name: Guillotine
moves.description: A vicious, tearing attack with big pincers. The target will faint instantly if this attack hits.

moves.name: Iron Defense
moves.description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: Metal Sound
moves.description: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly reduces the target's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Vice Grip
moves.description: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

moves.name: Sand Attack
moves.description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing its accuracy.

moves.name: Fury Cutter
moves.description: The target is slashed with scythes or claws. Its power increases if it hits in succession.

moves.name: Bite
moves.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

moves.name: Agility
moves.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

moves.name: Metal Claw
moves.description: The target is raked with steel claws. It may also raise the user's Attack stat.

moves.name: Bug Bite
moves.description: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Iron Head
moves.description: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. It may also make the target flinch.

moves.name: Dig
moves.description: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.

moves.name: Entrainment
moves.description: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target's Ability the same as the user's.

moves.name: X-Scissor
moves.description: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

moves.name: Iron Defense
moves.description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

moves.name: Guillotine
moves.description: A vicious, tearing attack with big pincers. The target will faint instantly if this attack hits.

moves.name: Metal Sound
moves.description: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly reduces the target's Sp. Def stat.
